titles.title: Frivolous Suit Reduction Act of 1994
To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide that a reasonable attorney's fee shall be awarded as a part of the cost to prevailing plaintiffs in Federal civil actions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/26/1994--Introduced. Frivolous Suit Reduction Act of 1994 - Amends the Federal judicial code to require a court of the United States to award a prevailing defendant in any civil action a reasonable attorney's fee as part of the costs.
